2.name: Basic Attack
2.desc: Delivers a basic attack which inflicts %i (3 + ATK/DEX + 30%WEAPDMG) physical damage using current wielded weapon.

3.name: Bash
3.desc: Delivers a close ranged strike which inflicts %i (8 + ATK/DEX + 35%WEAP) physical damage using current wielded weapon.

4.name: Dodge
4.desc: Makes a quick dash towards the direction the character is pointing to equal to 3 units.

6.name: First Aid
6.desc: Heals 25% of HP over 30 seconds. Only effective if HP is below 50%
